SqlList.SearchSql:
select a.FileListID, a.ArchiveID, a.Title, a.RootPath, a.wjbt,
(cast(a.FileListID as varchar)+'\\\\'+a.wjbt) as FILE_PATH, a.PID as GROUP_SID, a.Title as PHOTO_TITLE, a.psdd as SHOOT_LOCALE, a.psz as SHOOT_USER, (CASE WHEN a.pssj='' THEN '' ELSE CAST(a.pssj AS date) end) as SHOOT_DATE, a.wjbt as FILE_NAME, a.bz as PHOTO_NOTE from T_FileList a where a.bh like 'S%' {0} order by a.OrderIndex asc
